title: Should Banks Embrace the Four-Day Working Week?
description: Financial News' Emily Nicolle speaks to Atom Bank CEO Mark Mullen about the post-Covid balancing act of work and home, the pros and cons of the four-day week and whether investors should be considering the switch.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Financial News' Emily Nicolle speaks to Atom Bank CEO Mark Mullen about the post-Covid balancing act of work and home, the pros and cons of the four-day week and whether investors should be considering the switch.
content:encoded: Financial News' Emily Nicolle speaks to Atom Bank CEO Mark Mullen about the post-Covid balancing act of work and home, the pros and cons of the four-day week and whether investors should be considering the switch.
